title: Surface Success Metric context in Fit Score outputs (API, exports, reports)

sections.text: Update Fit Score read paths to always return the configured Success Metric definition (and weights, if applicable) alongside Fit Score values in the API and any CSV/PDF exports or share links. Ensure downstream consumers (dashboards, reporting views, integrations) display this context near the score to prevent teams comparing scores optimized for different objectives. Add a fallback message for legacy model versions that lack a Success Metric definition.
